attributes.action: Use the £100 million pounds that is going on a building a Mosque, to help those people whose homes, and small business' have been flooded, in the recent bad weather instead!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of spending £100 million on building a huge Mosque in London, this money should go towards helping the people whose homes, and small business' have been flooded instead!
Many of the areas flooded, have a lot of low income families, who cannot afford insurance, and those who can have found their insurance doesn't cover them for floods!!
Surely the British government should be using this money to help these people who are in desperate need?!
